Brooklyn_Park.Woodcrest Baptist Academy:
Woodcrest Baptist Academy (WBA) is a K-4 through 12th grade school located in Fridley, Minnesota, founded in 1973 by members of Woodcrest Baptist Church. WBA is a member of the American Association of Christian Schools (AACS) and the Minnesota Association of Christian Schools (MACS).


== History ==
